definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

pinyin: chuan4 xing2 dian3 zhen4 da3 yin4 ji1
ban4 dao3 ti3 chao1 dian3 zhen4
dian3 zhen4 shi4 da3 yin4 ji1

sentences.english: There are many standard formats for saving bitmaps in disk files.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用許多標準格式將點陣圖儲存在磁片檔案中。

sentences.english: Where we find any reflections at all determines the lattice type .
sentences.chinese: 只要最終發現任何反射，就可確定點陣類型。

sentences.english: When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 重設大小時，中繼檔保存的影像優於點陣圖。

sentences.english: This paper introduces an algorithm of compressing and recovering for low dot matrix Chinese characters library.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種低點陣漢字庫不失真壓縮還原算法。

sentences.english: Each button has a command and bitmap of your choice associated with it.
sentences.chinese: 每個按鈕有一個指揮和點陣圖您選擇的與此相關。

sentences.english: The Exploitation and Application of Matrix LCD in Portable Data Recorder.
sentences.chinese: 點陣式液晶顯示器在便攜式查表器中的開發與應用。

sentences.english: This paper deals with concerns the construction of an icosahedral quasilattice by the cut and project method.
sentences.chinese: 用切割投影法研究了二十面體準點陣結構。

sentences.english: Dot matrix LCD 40 dot segment driver.
This can also be thought of as the first scan line in the bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 這也可以視爲點陣圖中第一條掃描線。

sentences.english: A color table maps numbers in the bitmap to specific colors.
sentences.chinese: 色表會將點陣圖的數目對應爲特定色彩。

sentences.english: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 使用字元的圖像點陣圖繪製每個字元。

sentences.english: The raster fonts' flying-marking is realized by one-dimensional scanning mirror.
sentences.chinese: 使用一維振鏡來實現點陣字體的飛動標刻。

sentences.english: Describes how to load and draw bitmaps.
sentences.chinese: 描述如何載入和繪製點陣圖。

sentences.english: The design method and features of even-numbered Dammann gratings are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了偶數點陣達曼光柵的設計原理與特性。

sentences.english: Dot-matrix display program, showing values from 0-9.
sentences.chinese: 點陣顯示程序，顯示數值從0到9。

sentences.english: Bitmap images form a foundation for generic image processing and graphics systems.
sentences.chinese: 點陣圖檔影像是一般影像處理與圖片系統的基礎來源。
